overview:
Courtney Walsh is the Founder of Media Darling PR, a freelance public relations consultancy for startup technology companies primarily located in Boulder, Colorado. Prior to starting her own consultancy, Courtney served as Director of PR for OneRiot, the realtime search and advertising company.

Courtney has both corporate and agency public relations experience for consumer (B2C) and business to business (B2B) organizations. Prior to a career in public relations, Courtney served as a journalist for local and national TV and Radio news outlets. Her ability to craft newsworthy stories to help position companies as leaders of their industry and executives as experts in their respective fields has allowed her to establish strong working relationships with reporters and editors at top-tier business and news publications. Courtney has placed impact stories for her clients in every news medium including print, web, television and radio.

With a deep understanding of social media best practices she has helped companies build an online presence to deliver thought-leadership and expertise. She has secured keynote and panelist speaker slots for executives at some of the most recognized tradeshows and conferences in the nation.

Courtney holds a Bachelor’s Degree in Journalism from the University of Colorado at Boulder.
